metadata.title: CVE-2023-52838 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fbdev: imsttfb: fix a resource leak in probeI've re-written the error handling but the bug is that if init_imstt()fails we need to call iounmap(par->cmap_regs).

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
